**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 88 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Cast** **Range** 90 feet **Area** varies **Duration** 1 minute --- You conjure a dense storm of swirling confetti. All creatures within the area of the confetti become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), and all creatures outside the storm become concealed to creatures within it. Additionally, creatures in the area of the confetti continually hear the raucous sounds of a party or festival and take a –2 circumstance penalty on Perception checks to hear. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its area. You can Dismiss the spell.
(somatic) The spell's area is a 5-foot burst.
(somatic, verbal) The spell's area is a 10-foot burst.
(material, somatic, verbal) The spell's area is a 15-foot burst.
name: Confetti Cloud
